I'm not making any part of this post up. Zardus' memories really did 
happen.


::Zardus/Havoc/Demolition::

"That first shake was the taking off," Zardus replies, "If you wish, 
you can exit and have a look around."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Demolition walks over to a CR tank, putting Delta into it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Havoc puts Feline's parts on the table, waiting for a command from 
Zardus.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus walks over to another CR tank, putting Squizzy into it before 
walking over to a table. He lays the bot he had been carrying onto 
it, looking at the black sheet that covere'd the bot's body and head.

The bot was a relic from the old days of the Alliance, a relic that 
had nearly caused Zardus leadership at one point. His hand takes the 
sheet that covered the bot, sliding it off his face.

The relic was himself. Not a clone, not a copy, not a projection, but 
Zardus himself. The Alliance leader glances down at the blue orb that 
was melted into his left palm and through his left hand, looking at 
his other self's identical orb. That orb was the physical 
manifistation of the Vok being that had started the Alliance, a long 
time ago...

The bot on the table was totaly identical to Zardus, except that he 
was older, much older, by a few hundred years. He had been Zardus, 
had lived Zardus' life, and at one point traveled back through time, 
ending up a few hundred years before the Neo Beast Wars and going 
temporarily offline. Zardus had found him and reactivated him in a 
cave shortly after he had started the Alliance.

Future Zardus, as he had been dubbed, joined the Alliance for a 
while, but then tried to take over. He would have been successful, 
but Nemesis had taken him out with a missile to the back after 
Zergling had attacked him.

Zardus frowns, turning the bot over to look at the charred hole in 
his back. He picks him up, putting him into a CR tank.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Havoc and Demolition look on in confusion as Zardus puts Zardus in a 
CR tank.

"Should we stay here, Zardus?" Havoc asks, looking at the Alliance 
leader.

"You may leave if you wish," Zaruds replies, checking a screen for 
repair progress, "If anyone is having trouble getting to base, help 
them."

Havoc and Demolition nod, walking out of the room.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The five shuttles that had carried the Alliance base to the island 
turn around, heading back to the mainland to transport any more 
ground troops if needed.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Punch:
> 
> 
> 
> Punch shook his head slightly.  "Arrived, sir?  When did we leave?  
When did 
> we leave?" he checked the scanners.  "Base is in perfect condition."
